name: rFOX
valueProposition: A community-owned, private, non-custodial, multichain platform putting you in full control of your digital assets.
technicalHighlights: Integration with leading DEXs and aggregators for best rates
Non-custodial wallet ensuring user control over assets
integrationOpportunities: Partnerships with other DeFi protocols for expanded services
competitorComparison: Compared to other multichain platforms like MetaMask and Trust Wallet, ShapeShift offers a unique community-owned model with a focus on privacy and non-custodial asset management, while providing a wide range of tradable assets and governance through FOX tokens.
